segment.source: Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 SP1
segment.target: Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 SP1

segment.source: Active Directory Requirements
segment.target: Active Directory Requirements

segment.source: When configuring the MED-V server, if users are not part of the same domain the server belongs to, a trust must be set between the domains.
segment.target: When configuring the MED-V server, if users are not part of the same domain the server belongs to, a trust must be set between the domains.

segment.source: How to Install the Report Database
segment.target: How to Install the Report Database

segment.source: The report database is required for storing all MED-V workspace logs.
segment.target: The report database is required for storing all MED-V workspace logs.

segment.source: The log database is then used for generating MED-V reports.
segment.target: The log database is then used for generating MED-V reports.

segment.source: For information about reports, see MED-V Reporting.
segment.target: For information about reports, see MED-V Reporting.

segment.source: SQL Server can be installed on the same server as the MED-V server or on a remote server.
segment.target: SQL Server can be installed on the same server as the MED-V server or on a remote server.

segment.source: If installing on a remote server, see Installing SQL Server on a Remote Server.
segment.target: If installing on a remote server, see Installing SQL Server on a Remote Server.

segment.source: Installing SQL Server on a Remote Server
segment.target: Installing SQL Server on a Remote Server

segment.source: To install SQL Server on a remote server
segment.target: To install SQL Server on a remote server

segment.source: Configure the following on the remote server:
segment.target: Configure the following on the remote server:

segment.source: Instance name—Default instance
segment.target: Instance name—Default instance

segment.source: Authentication mode—Mixed mode
segment.target: Authentication mode—Mixed mode

segment.source: User—The default user created is “sa”
segment.target: User—The default user created is “sa”

segment.source: Password—Desired password
segment.target: Password—Desired password

segment.source: Collation Settings—Default
segment.target: Collation Settings—Default

segment.source: Error in usage report settings—Default
segment.target: Error in usage report settings—Default

segment.source: Install the following files on the MED-V server:
segment.target: Install the following files on the MED-V server:

segment.source: To install the prerequisites for the management pack objects collection for Microsoft SQL Server 2008, download Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Native Client from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To install the prerequisites for the management pack objects collection for Microsoft SQL Server 2008, download Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Native Client from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: To install the prerequisites for the management pack objects collection for Microsoft SQL Server 2005, download Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Native Client from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To install the prerequisites for the management pack objects collection for Microsoft SQL Server 2005, download Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Native Client from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: To install the required dll files for Microsoft SQL Server 2008, download Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Management Objects Collection from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To install the required dll files for Microsoft SQL Server 2008, download Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Management Objects Collection from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: To install the required dll files for Microsoft SQL Server 2005, download Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Management Objects from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To install the required dll files for Microsoft SQL Server 2005, download Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Management Objects from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: To install the stand-alone install packages that provide additional value for SQL Server 2008, download the Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Feature Pack from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To install the stand-alone install packages that provide additional value for SQL Server 2008, download the Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Feature Pack from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: To install the stand-alone install packages that provide additional value for SQL Server 2005, download the Feature Pack for Microsoft SQL Server 2005 from the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To install the stand-alone install packages that provide additional value for SQL Server 2005, download the Feature Pack for Microsoft SQL Server 2005 from the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: For more information about these files, see Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Feature Pack on the Microsoft Download Center (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163960) or Feature Pack for Microsoft SQL Server 2005 on the Microsoft Download Center (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163961).
segment.target: For more information about these files, see Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Feature Pack on the Microsoft Download Center (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163960) or Feature Pack for Microsoft SQL Server 2005 on the Microsoft Download Center (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163961).

segment.source: Antivirus/Backup Software Configuration
segment.target: Antivirus/Backup Software Configuration

segment.source: To prevent antivirus activity from affecting the performance of the virtual desktop, it is recommended where possible to exclude the following virtual machine file types from any antivirus or backup processing running on the host:
segment.target: To prevent antivirus activity from affecting the performance of the virtual desktop, it is recommended where possible to exclude the following virtual machine file types from any antivirus or backup processing running on the host:

segment.source: .VMC
segment.target: .VMC

segment.source: .VUD
segment.target: .VUD

segment.source: .VSV
segment.target: .VSV

segment.source: .CKM
segment.target: .CKM

segment.source: .EVHD
segment.target: .EVHD

segment.source: How to Install and Configure Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 SP1
segment.target: How to Install and Configure Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 SP1

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: If Virtual PC for Windows exists on the host computer, uninstall it before installing Virtual PC 2007 SP1.
segment.target: If Virtual PC for Windows exists on the host computer, uninstall it before installing Virtual PC 2007 SP1.

segment.source: To install Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 SP1
segment.target: To install Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 SP1

segment.source: Download Virtual PC 2007 SP1 from the Microsoft Download Center Virtual PC 2007 SP1.
segment.target: Download Virtual PC 2007 SP1 from the Microsoft Download Center Virtual PC 2007 SP1.

segment.source: Run the installation file on the host computer, and follow the wizard.
segment.target: Run the installation file on the host computer, and follow the wizard.

segment.source: Install Virtual PC 2007 SP1 update on the host computer in elevated mode.
segment.target: Install Virtual PC 2007 SP1 update on the host computer in elevated mode.

segment.source: For more information, see the description of the hotfix package for Virtual PC 2007 SP1.
segment.target: For more information, see the description of the hotfix package for Virtual PC 2007 SP1.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The Virtual PC 2007 SP1 update is required for running Virtual PC 2007 SP1.
segment.target: The Virtual PC 2007 SP1 update is required for running Virtual PC 2007 SP1.
